name: otho
description: A tiny javascript library for handling and animating images

scripts.build:min: browserify src/index.js -s Otho -t babelify | uglifyjs > dist/otho.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:unmin && npm run build:min && node build
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/babel-istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly test --recursive

author: Louie Colgan
